hints.text: Components are a feature in Boolean that allow you to save a selection of tiles to be used later in other puzzles or projects.
To create a new component, create a selection of floortiles and click on CREATE in the components window.
To spawn in a saved component, simply click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON on its name in the component window and click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON again where you want to spawn it.
Click RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON outside the grid to stop placing the component.
Components come with a simple overlay which shows its name. To show overlays, check the Overlay checkbox in the top corner.
When you solve this puzzle, you might want to add your creation, which will be an XOR-gate, to your Components. It will be useful in later puzzles.
